document_data.name: Begoas
document_data.mainbody: '''Begoas the Inquisitive''' was a handsome [[human]] [[necromancer]] from the [[Old Empires]] region and the first Minister of Necromancy in the city of [[Ravens Bluff]]'s [[Ministry of Art]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite polyhedron/98/The Ministry of Art: Ravens Bluff's Newest Government Branch|6-7}}
document_data.Personality: Begoas was a soft-spoken individual, prone to giving wise advice. He had a deep fascination with human [[anatomy]], a fascination that some believed had no boundaries. When it came to [[necromancy]], Begoas was very outspoken against the prejudice of Ravens Bluff's populace, saying that his study of that [[school of magic]] was done for the purpose of opposing those who would use it for evil purposes, though many Ravenians didn't believe his protestations.
